DOC.detailed_description: This study design prospective , multicenter , open-label , single arm , pilot study . Eligible subject symptomatic osteoarthritis medial compartment knee enrol study receive Atlas Knee Implant . The study population consist adult subject age 25 80 year , diagnosis medial knee osteoarthritis ( Kellgen Lawrence Grades 1-4 , except bony erosion ) pain study knee demonstrate overall WOMAC pain score ≥ 40 ( scale 0-100 ) .
